title: ‘Second Would Be One of My Greatest Career Results:’ Vingegaard Takes Stock of 2024 Tour de France Performance
content:
For the defending Tour winner, a likely podium finish after returning from a nightmare crash is a victory in and of itself.

Read the full article at ‘Second Would Be One of My Greatest Career Results:’ Vingegaard Takes Stock of 2024 Tour de France Performance on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
